article.headline: Peloton's stock pulls back from record after Amazon unveils exclusive Echelon smart connect fitness bikes
article.body: Shares of Peloton Interactive Inc. PTON, +6.97% dropped 3.0% in premarket trading, to pull back from the previous session's record close, after Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, +3.01% unveiled its "Echelon Smart Connect Fitness Bikes," for $499. The Amazon exclusive offers live and on-demand classes, and said one membership works for all machines including Connect Bikes, Row, Reflect mirrors and future machines. Peloton's exercise bike starts at $1,895, and the Peloton Bike+ offering starts at $64 per month. Peloton's stock has rocketed 233.8% year to date through Monday, while Amazon shares have rallied 60.2% and the S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% has gained 1.6%.
